triplets: Tool with bristles used to apply paint or other liquids
Painting walls, canvas, furniture, artwork, and craft projects
Bristles (natural or synthetic), wood or plastic handle, metal ferrule
Handle, bristles, ferrule, and sometimes a protective cap
Typically wooden handle with colored bristles indicating type
Various sizes from fine detail brushes to broad wall brushes
Art supply brands, hardware companies, and brush makers
Months to years depending on care and frequency of use
